text: nirakarikkum penkalukku, nuh napiyinutaiya manaiviyaiyum, lut napiyinutaiya manaiviyaiyum allah utaranamakki vaikkiran. Ivviru penkalum, nam atiyarkalil iru nallatiyarkalin manaivikalakave iruntanar. Eninum, ivviru penkalum tankal kanavanmarkalukkut turokam ceytanar. (Akave, ivarkal iruvarum napimarkalin manaivikalayiruntum) allahvutaiya vetanaiyiliruntu etaiyum tatuttukkolla mutiyavillai. (Ivarkal turokam ceytatan karanamaka ivarkalai nokki) â€˜â€˜narakattil pukupavarkalutan ninkal iruvarum pukuntu vitunkal'' enre kurappattatu
